Despite playing it for over 500 hours, I can't recommend this game.

The developers clearly intended this to be a casual, fun game but the only mode you can play is ranked. This leads to situations where you will only see the strongest characters and perks the more you play, as your rank improves. You can play with and against all your favourite horror movie icons - in theory, as you will only play against The Blight, The Nurse and The Huntress. 

The grind to unlock the in-game currency is comparable to the most predatory mobile games. The grind to unlock perks on every character is comparable only to the trials of Sisyphus.

The only scary part of the game is how addictive it is. More by luck than judgement the developers - never having made a good game prior to this - accidentally struck gold in the undeveloped 1v4 asymmetric game market. Only nowadays you're as likely to get a hacker as a legitimate player for your opponent - and the in-game report system literally does nothing. To report a cheater you need video evidence, the Steam ID of the cheater, and to report it on an arcane portion of their website which they do not make it easy to access.

This game could never be good but it can be fun. Play it with your friends and never touch the matchmaking, and then you might have a chance at enjoying it

It's an amazing game if you hate yourself. This game requires many many hours of dedication just to be considered "good" the game has a unhealthy balance at the moment but with enough time and maybe a health chapter the game will be fresh and exciting. Killers a lot of fun especially if you like getting chased down by Nea and trying to deal with flashlights and brand new parts!! Survivor is also great if you love teammates who throw down the most powerful pallets in the game for no reason when the killer isn't around or self caring in the corner of the map when you're dying on hook. Overall a great experience as a member of the dead by daylight community!!
no kind to new players but once you get it the fun you will have messing with other player is worth it

This game is very fun if you're playing against casual players.  But it's basically unplayable if you are against sweaty people.  You really get punished if you get better at the game, as the matchmaking will pair you with enemies who are simply way better than you and absolutely flatten you.  I'll probably play this when the next patch comes out, but I don't know for how long.  I wish they'd just do something about the overwhelming defeats you constantly get at higher matchmaking.  It feels unfair and unfun.
